cards.text: Hari bought a book for Rs. 500 and sold it for Rs. 700. Calculate his profit amount? [Rs. __]
The cost price of a T.V. is Rs. 2,000. Ram gets a profit of Rs. 500. What is the selling price of that T.V.? [Rs. ___]
Dipika bought a toy car at Rs. 700 and sold it at Rs. 490. Find her loss percentage.
Sandip has bought a radio for Rs. 900 and sold it to Ram for Rs. 1,080. Find his profit percentage.
After selling a watch at Rs. 500, Rita bears a loss of Rs. 200. What is the cost price of watch? [Rs. __]
If the cost price of 1 kg apple is Rs. 200 and the selling price is Rs. 220. What will be the profit percentage of 1 kg apple?
Ram bought a dozen of pencil for Rs. 200 and sold them at Rs. 150 per dozen. Calculate his loss percentage.
Ritika bought a fan for Rs. 3,000 and sold it at 5% profit. Find her profit amount. [Rs. __]
Binod bought a table for Rs. 1,000 and sold it at 20% loss. Calculate the selling price of the table. [Rs. __]
Shyam gets a profit of Rs. 300 after selling a bag for Rs. 900. Calculate his profit percentage.

description: Read the questions properly and fill in the correct answers.
